ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 62/faction limits
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone know how to raise faction with merchants in ak anon?  I m kindly with everyone, but indifferent with the merchants.  :( Slightly off-topic, but if I
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone know how to raise faction with merchants in ak'anon? I'm kindly with
everyone, but indifferent with the merchants. :( Slightly off-topic, but if
I could get my faction real high with the guy that sells the tinker parts, I
could try more fishingpole combinations. :)

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 62/faction limits


> From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>

> Based on my experience, you are exactly right) Thanx for spelling it out.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Quasinom de Plume [mailto:eqmailing@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 10:37 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 62/faction limits
>
>
> From: =?iso-8859-1?q?Quasinom=20de=20Plume?= <eqmailing@...>
>
> I believe the scale goes like this:
>
> Scowls (being the worst - KOS)
> Threatenly (KOS if you hang around)
> Dubiously
> Apprehensibly
> Indifferent
> Amiable
> Warmly
> Kindly (Best possible faction - best prices)
>
> Let me know if I've forgotten one or put one in the wrong order.
>
> Quasinom de Plume
